content: 3 sts single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in ch2 space single_crochet in each single_crochet till you reach the center stitch of the vallley slip_stitch in next st *single_crochet in each st to ch2 space single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in ch2 space single_crochet in each single_crochet till you reach the center st of the valley slip_stitch in next st* 7 times single_crochet in each st till beginning of round slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet fasten_off and weave in all ends securely with a tapestry needle round 6 round 7
